docs.title: Home
docs.text: # Viken Shaumitra Parikh  **Software Engineer | Backend, ML, and AI**  I build backend platforms and intelligent products with practical machine learning and applied AI.   View Resume GitHub Profile

docs.title: Recruiter Overview
docs.text: ### What I Build - Backend platforms and APIs - ML-powered product features - Applied AI solutions for real workflows   ### How I Deliver - Production-first engineering - Measurable business outcomes - Maintainable, testable implementations   ### What You Can Expect - Strong ownership mindset - Clear communication with stakeholders - Fast iteration with engineering rigor

docs.title: Focus Areas
docs.text: ### Backend Systems  Building practical, production-ready outcomes with strong engineering rigor.    ### Machine Learning  Building practical, production-ready outcomes with strong engineering rigor.

docs.title: Core Competencies
docs.text: ### Languages & Runtime   Python  ### AI & ML   Machine Learning Deep Learning  ### Data & Platforms   Data Engineering Backend Development  ### Cloud & DevOps   Cloud

docs.title: Featured GitHub Projects
docs.text: GitHub  #### [edumind-ai](https://github.com/vikenparikh/edumind-ai)  AI-powered educational intelligence platform with adaptive learning and analytics   ★ 0 ⑂ 0 Python GitHub  #### [investiq-ai](https://github.com/vikenparikh/investiq-ai)  AI-driven financial intelligence platform with portfolio optimization and risk analysis   ★ 0 ⑂ 0 Python GitHub  #### [Machine-Learning-Implementation](https://github.com/vikenparikh/Machine-Learning-Implementation)  Machine Learning Algortihms Implemenations   ★ 1 ⑂ 0 Jupyter Notebook GitHub  #### [AWS-AutoScaling-Object-Detection](https://github.com/vikenparikh/AWS-AutoScaling-Object-Detection)  The aim of the Project was about developing a cloud platform using Amazon web services that can take requests from url of a video from the user and return the list of objects detected in the video along with the name of the video   ★ 0 ⑂ 0 Java GitHub  #### [Mutext](https://github.com/vikenparikh/Mutext)  Music and text generation   ★ 1 ⑂ 0 Python GitHub  #### [PhoCaptionator](https://github.com/vikenparikh/PhoCaptionator)  Photo Captioning Application   ★ 1 ⑂ 0 Python GitHub  #### [Shampoo-Sales-forecasting](https://github.com/vikenparikh/Shampoo-Sales-forecasting)  Multi step LSTM network for forecastig shampoo sales   ★ 1 ⑂ 1 Python GitHub  #### [System-Programming-and-Compiler-Construction-Codes](https://github.com/vikenparikh/System-Programming-and-Compiler-Construction-Codes)  Implementation of various programs from the SPCC course   ★ 1 ⑂ 0 Java GitHub  #### [Travigate](https://github.com/vikenparikh/Travigate)  A Personal Travel App   ★ 1 ⑂ 0 Python

docs.text:
Showing 24 of 45 repositories.

  • Android-Quiz-App - Quiz App with Login, Sign Up using Firebase and scores, questions using local database. (★ 1, ⑂ 0, Java)

  • awesome-llm-apps - Collection of awesome LLM apps with AI Agents and RAG using OpenAI, Anthropic, Gemini and opensource models. (★ 0, ⑂ 0)

  • Deep-math-machine-learning.ai - A blog which talks about machine learning, deep learning and the Math. and Machine learning algorithms written from scratch. (★ 0, ⑂ 0, Jupyter Notebook)

  • generative-ai-for-beginners - 21 Lessons, Get Started Building with Generative AI (★ 0, ⑂ 0)
  • hands-on-large-language-models - Official code repo for the O'Reilly Book - "Hands-On Large Language Models" (★ 0, ⑂ 0)

docs.title: Root
docs.text:
This repo powers my personal website at https://vikenparikh.github.io. It auto-generates a portfolio site from project READMEs using unified_docs + MkDocs. Edit unified_docs.json for profile details, skills, project links/summaries/images, scan_paths, and resume auto-sync setting

← Back to portfolio

docs.title: README
docs.text:
Expand/collapse full README # Viken Parikh — Personal Website This repo powers my personal website at https://vikenparikh.github.io. It auto-generates a portfolio site from project READMEs using `unified_docs` + MkDocs. ## Setup 
python3 -m venv .venv
source .venv/bin/activate
pip install -r requirements.txt
pip install -e .
## Build 
unified-docs build --root .
## Preview 
mkdocs serve
## Personalization Edit `unified_docs.json` for profile details, skills, project links/summaries/images, `scan_paths`, and resume auto-sync settings. ## Architecture - `unified_docs/`: generator framework (collection, combining, site build) - `docs/`: generated Markdown + portfolio styling - `site/`: generated static output for deployment - `legacy_site/`: archived old static HTML/PHP implementation
